attributes.action: Protect our Armed Forces to Have the right to Wear Uniform in this Country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I fully agree with the PM our service men and women should be able to wear uniform in public and wear the uniform with pride.
But as a country we must protect our services from those who will abuse them. The government should make it clear that anyone found guilty of such abuse will be given a custodial sentence and if they are foreign nationals on release they will be deported without any right of appeal.
